feed.title: taylorcowen.com
feed.subtitle: Some reviews of the things we've bought, things we've done, and the places we've been with our daughter - and hopefully giving some usual advice as to whether they are any good

entry.title: Shnuggle Baby Bath
entry.summary: We’ve been using this bath for our baby since birth, and have only recently upgraded to the toddler version, it has been great. The Shnuggle Baby Bath You can buy this directly from the manufacturer via shnuggle.com, or on Amazon
